name: Furry Network Theme
description:
Currently changes the website theme to be green and makes the cursor into a green pawprint, future versions will allow custom set colors and will provide more cursors.
Use http://www.color-hex.com/ to find the rgb value.
Message if you find a bug or have a suggestion @ http://www.furaffinity.net/user/xdelta/ or https://beta.furrynetwork.com/delta/
